resources.string: We must be just as much aware of the quality of our air as we are of the food we eat and the water we drink.We believe that people do not understand the entirety of the negative effects of air pollution. We believe as a company in AQI India that educating people about air pollution will improve their lives & the lives of their loved ones. We, at AQI India work for you to be aware of the air you are breathing in. By making Air Pollution monitors, we help you to know how much pollutants are around you and how you can be away from it or keep yourself safe from it. We, at AQI India want you to know WHAT YOU BREATHE.
The air quality is good and has no general risks to sensitive people or even healthy people.
